means: 令人惊讶地，不可思议地，妙极地

sentence.Network_en: He was marvelously cool again, smiling as if nothing had happened.
sentence.Network_cn: 他又变得出奇地冷静，微笑着，好像什么也没有发生过。

sentence.Network_en: Their voices blend marvelously as they sing in chorus.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们合唱时嗓音非常和谐。

sentence.Network_en: Almost every turn reeled in a marvelously inventive scene.
sentence.Network_cn: 几乎每一轮都在[让人]晕眩在一种极美的创造性场景之中.
